Articles.Content: Started playing KSP while deployed about a year ago and have been addicted ever since. I use the forums regularly and just felt like I should start giving back so I decided to register. Hopefully I can help someone as much as some of you have helped me.

Welcome to the forums! Glad to see we've got some royalty among us. Feel free to jump into Gameplay Questions and pass on some of the wisdom you've acquired on to anyone who needs help there. In general, make yourself at home.
